Source code for common_tests.test_confusion_matrix

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

import unittest
import logging
import pathlib

from common.environment_variable import get_homedir

import common.ChartMaker.confusion_matrix_generator as confusion_matrix_generator
from common.Graph.cluster import Cluster



[docs]class TestClusterMatcher(unittest.TestCase):
    """Basic test cases."""


[docs]    def setUp(self):
        self.logger = logging.getLogger()
        # self.conf = .Default_configuration()
        self.test_file_path = get_homedir() / pathlib.Path("carlhauser_client_tests/evaluator/confusion_matrix")
        self.matrix_gen = confusion_matrix_generator.ConfusionMatrixGenerator()



[docs]    def test_absolute_truth_and_meaning(self):
        self.assertTrue(True)



[docs]    def test_match_clusters_from_dump(self):

        cA = Cluster("A", "A", {0, 1, 2})
        cB = Cluster("B", "B", {4,5,6,7,8,9,10})

        c1 = Cluster("1", '1', {0, 2})
        c2 = Cluster("2", "2", {4,5,8,9})

        pair_list = [[cA, c1], [cB, c2]]

        self.matrix_gen.create_and_export_confusion_matrix([cA, cB], [c1,c2], pair_list, self.test_file_path / "matrix.pdf")




if __name__ == '__main__':
    unittest.main()
